document_data.name: Beckon
document_data.mainbody: '''''Beckon''''' was a [[divine magic]] spell of the [[southern magic]] tradition{{Southernmagic}} that affected one semi-intelligent or less intelligent creature. It was usually used on a domesticated creature of the caster, or a creature who was susceptible to the ''[[animal friendship]]'' spell.
document_data.Effects: The creature heard the call of the caster from up to {{SI|1|mi|k}} away, and was compelled to rush to the caster as quickly as possible.
document_data.Components: This spell required a verbal call to the creature and a piece of the animal's favorite food as a material component.
